name: UIPopoverController
desc: Important: UIPopoverController is deprecated in iOS 9. In iOS 9 and later, a popover is implemented as a UIViewController presentation. To create a popover, use an instance of UIPopoverPresentationController and specify the UIModalPresentationStyle.popover style.

items.name: init(contentViewController: UIViewController)
items.desc: Returns an initialized popover controller object.

items.name: func present(from: CGRect, in: UIView, permittedArrowDirections: UIPopoverArrowDirection, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Displays the popover and anchors it to the specified location in the view.

items.name: func present(from: UIBarButtonItem, permittedArrowDirections: UIPopoverArrowDirection, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Displays the popover and anchors it to the specified bar button item.

items.name: var contentViewController: UIViewController
items.desc: The view controller responsible for the content portion of the popover.

items.name: func setContentView(UIViewController, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the view controller responsible for the content portion of the popover.

items.name: var contentSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size of the popover’s content view.

items.name: func setContentSize(CGSize, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Changes the size of the popover’s content view.

items.name: var passthroughViews: [UIView]?
items.desc: An array of views that the user can interact with while the popover is visible.

items.name: var isPopoverVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the popover is currently visible.

items.name: var arrowDirection: UIPopoverArrowDirection
items.desc: The direction of the popover’s arrow.

items.name: var delegate: UIPopoverControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate you want to receive popover controller messages.

items.name: var layoutMargins: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The margins that define the portion of the screen in which it is permissible to display the popover.

items.name: var backgroundViewClass: AnyClass?
items.desc: The class to use for displaying the popover background content.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color of the popover’s backdrop view.

items.name: struct UIPopoverArrowDirection
items.desc: Constants for specifying the direction of the popover arrow.
